scripts.i18n:json: npm run wp-env:cli -- wp i18n make-json languages languages --no-purge
scripts.i18n:pot: npm run wp-env:cli -- wp i18n make-pot . languages/wp-graphql.pot --slug=wp-graphql --domain=wp-graphql --include=src,access-functions.php,wp-graphql.php --exclude=node_modules,vendor,tests,build,packages
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:php
scripts.lint:php: npm run wp-env:cli -- composer run check-cs -- -d memory_limit=256M
scripts.lint:php:fix: npm run wp-env:cli -- composer run fix-cs -- -d memory_limit=256M
scripts.lint:php:stan: npm run wp-env:cli -- composer run phpstan
scripts.test:codecept: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql/ -- bash -c 'TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} vendor/bin/codecept "$@"' --
scripts.test:codecept:acceptance: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql/ -- bash -c 'TEST_WP_URL=http://tests-wordpress TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} vendor/bin/codecept run acceptance "$@"' --
scripts.test:codecept:coverage: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql/ -- bash -c 'XDEBUG_MODE=coverage TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} vendor/bin/codecept "$@"' --
scripts.test:codecept:functional: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql/ -- bash -c 'TEST_WP_URL=http://tests-wordpress TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} vendor/bin/codecept run functional "$@"' --
scripts.test:codecept:wpunit: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql/ -- bash -c 'TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} vendor/bin/codecept run wpunit "$@"' --
